org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class AppCloudlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.AppCloudlet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WorkflowApp

    public class AppCloudlet
extends Object
    AppCloudlet class represents an application which user submit for execution within datacenter. It consist of several networkClouds. Please refer to following publication for more details: Saurabh Kumar Garg and Rajkumar Buyya, NetworkCloudSim: Modelling Parallel Applications in Cloud Simulations, Proceedings of the 4th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Utility and Cloud Computing (UCC 2011, IEEE CS Press, USA), Melbourne, Australia, December 5-7, 2011.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Saurabh Kumar Garg
